changelog.release_notes: Fixed wrong date value since cw19 2016 and the calendar week itself
Fixed the not displayed working time in the first line
new 0.10.15 because deleting the 1.0 to re-release it didn't work

data.description: he unlock code is 13321 where the right buttons are 1,2,3 from up to down. With TimeTracker (TT) you are able to clock your daily work time including your flex time account and time rules. TT provides an easy to use interface with the possibility to set 16 clocks per day. At the end of each day you can do an "end of day" to save the clocks into a weekly overview and to save the new flex time value. Work times will be saved for the current week and will be reseted at the first "end of day" in the new week. Features: - "en" language - Clock up to 16 times per day - Display current work time / day end time / flex time - Display break time - Indicates a connected / disconnected BT connection - Hide mode for more privacy - TimeTable for the last week / current flex time / lost time - Display "last time charged" in the time table - Inverts and vibrates when loosing time because of the time rules For detailed information review the documentation at: http://www.albmail.de/Pebble/TimeTracker/TimeTracker.pdf (Thanks Jo) If you like the watch face please donate: pebble.donate@albmail.de

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed wrong date value since cw19 2016 and the calendar week itself

data.title: TimeTracker
